parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.50

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Event Handlers

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Removes all mission event handlers of the given type which were added by [[addMissionEventHandler]].

<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature </title><part><name index="1"/><value> important </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> This command also resets the Event Handler creation index to 0.</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[removeAllMissionEventHandlers]] type

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> type: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[removeAllMissionEventHandlers]] "Loaded";</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[removeMissionEventHandler]], [[addMissionEventHandler]]
</value></part></template></root>
